name: LoginBox Widget
author: GeoSn0w (@FCE365)

sections.description:
The idea is simple, the plugin adds a widget to the sidebar that can work in two modes. If the user is authenticated it shows “Hello ” and a button that goes to the user profile settings page,
and if the user is not authenticated it will show a button called “Authenticate” that will show the login form if pressed.

Additional credits

The logo is a free icon provided by https://www.flaticon.com/authors/pixel-perfect licensed under Flaticon Basic License (Free with attribution):
https://file000.flaticon.com/downloads/license/license.pdf

short_description: A simple conditional login box widget for the sidebar.
description:
The idea is simple, the plugin adds a widget to the sidebar that can work in two modes. If the user is authenticated it shows “Hello ” and a button that goes to the user profile settings page,
